original_text: Was a man already circumcised when he was called? He should not become uncircumcised. Was a man uncircumcised when he was called? He should not be circumcised.
korean_text: 할례자로서 부르심을 받은 자가 있느냐 무할례자가 되지 말며 무할례자로 부르심을 받은 자가 있느냐 할례를 받지 말라

sentences.original_text: Was a man already circumcised when he was called?
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 부르심을 받았을 때 이미 할례를 받은 사람이었습니까?
그는 할례받지 않은 상태가 되어서는 안 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: Was a man uncircumcised when he was called?
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 부르심을 받았을 때 할례받지 않은 사람이었습니까?
